trans-unit.source: Represents the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response at a specific <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表 SOAP 要求或在特定的 SOAP 回應中的資料<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The primary use of the SoapMessage class is for SOAP extensions, representing the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: SoapMessage 類別的主要用途是針對 SOAP 擴充功能，表示 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應中的資料。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> method is called, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension> receives a SoapMessage at each <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>呼叫方法時，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension>會在每個<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> SoapMessage 接收</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is up to the particular SOAP extension to choose how to process the SoapMessage.
trans-unit.target: 這是由選擇如何處理 SoapMessage 特定的 SOAP 擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: Common SOAP extensions include encryption and compression.
trans-unit.target: 常見的 SOAP 延伸模組包含加密和壓縮。

trans-unit.source: SOAP extensions can be applied to either or both an XML Web service method created using ASP.NET or an XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 延伸模組可以套用至這兩個 XML Web 服務方法建立或使用 ASP.NET 或 XML Web 服務用戶端。

trans-unit.source: When a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service method, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> method receives an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>, which derives from SoapMessage.
trans-unit.target: 當 SOAP 擴充功能套用到 XML Web service 方法，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>方法會接收的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>，其衍生自 SoapMessage。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service client, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> receives an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，當 SOAP 擴充功能套用至 XML Web 服務用戶端，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>接收<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>執行個體</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the SOAPAction HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得 SOAPAction HTTP 要求標頭欄位的 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應。

trans-unit.source: The Action property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: [動作] 屬性可以存取任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應 SOAPAction HTTP 要求標頭欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the contents of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Encoding" name="Content-Encoding" href=""></xref> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的內容<xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Encoding" name="Content-Encoding" href=""> </xref> HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: A SOAP extension can set the ContentEncoding property to provide supplementary information about the encoding of a SOAP message without changing the media type as expressed in the `Content-Type` HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 延伸模組可以將 ContentEncoding 屬性設定為提供的編碼方式相關之 SOAP 訊息而不需要變更的媒體類型所表示的補充資訊`Content-Type`HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Encoding" name="Content-Encoding" href=""></xref> HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Encoding" name="Content-Encoding" href=""> </xref> HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> stages.
trans-unit.target: The current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> stages.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""></xref> of the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""> </xref>之 SOAP 要求的 SOAP 回應。

trans-unit.source: The ContentType property can only be accessed in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stages; otherwise, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: ContentType 屬性只能存取在<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>階段; 否則<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.ContentEncoding%2A> property, instead of the ContentType property to provide supplementary information about the encoding of a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.ContentEncoding%2A>屬性，而不是 ContentType 屬性，以提供 SOAP 訊息的編碼方式相關的補充資訊。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage.ContentEncoding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""></xref> of the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: HTTP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Type" name="Content-Type" href=""> </xref>之 SOAP 要求的 SOAP 回應。

trans-unit.source: The default is "text/xml".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為"text/xml"。

trans-unit.source: ContentType is accessed <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> stages.
trans-unit.target: 存取 ContentType <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref>階段。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> is a stage where in parameters are available.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，判斷提示目前<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref>是位置參數中的階段可用。

trans-unit.source: The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: 判斷提示的階段是不同的 XML Web 服務用戶端和 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service method's in parameters are available after the SOAP request is deserialized in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 要求會在還原序列化之後，會提供 XML Web 服務方法的參數中<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>階段。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: For an XML Web service client, the in parameters are available prior to the SOAP request serialization process in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務用戶端中，參數可以使用的 SOAP 要求序列化程序，在之前<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>階段。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: EnsureInStage can be called during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>, however an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when in parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何呼叫 EnsureInStage <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>，但是<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>時擲回參數不可以使用。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: In parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: 參數中無法使用。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> stage is a stage where out parameters are available.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，判斷提示目前<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref>階段是 out 參數其中一個階段可用。

trans-unit.source: The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: 判斷提示的階段是不同的 XML Web 服務用戶端和 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service method's out parameters are available prior to the SOAP response serialization process in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務方法的輸出參數會在 SOAP 回應序列化程序之前，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>階段。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: In an XML Web service client, the out parameters are available after the SOAP response deserialization process in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML Web 服務用戶端，out 參數後可用的 SOAP 回應還原序列化程序中<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>階段。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: EnsureOutStage can be called during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>, however an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown when out parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何呼叫 EnsureOutStage <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>，但是<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>時擲回參數不可以使用。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: Out parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: Out 參數無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the call to the XML Web service method is the stage or stages passed in.
trans-unit.target: 可確保<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref>呼叫 XML Web 服務的方法是在階段或階段傳入。

trans-unit.source: If the current processing stage is not one of the stages passed in, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的處理階段不是其中一個階段中傳遞，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Multiple stages can be asserted by performing a bitwise OR operation on multiple instances of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> class.
trans-unit.target: 多個階段可以執行多個<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>類別</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>執行個體上的位元 OR 運算的方式已判斷提示

trans-unit.source: EnsureStage can be called during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: EnsureStage 任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間呼叫

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> asserted.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"> </xref>判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> is not the asserted stage or stages.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref>不是已判斷提示的階段。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"></xref> from the call to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"></xref>從 XML Web service 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The Exception property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況屬性可以存取任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"></xref> that occurred in the call to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"> </xref>所發生的 XML Web service 方法的呼叫中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"></xref> has occurred during the call to the Web Sevice method.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException"> </xref> Web 服務方法的呼叫期間發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameter passed into the XML Web service method at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得傳遞至指定索引處的 XML Web 服務方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: The GetInParameterValue property is only accessible when in parameters are available.
trans-unit.target: GetInParameterValue 屬性是只可用在參數中的可存取時。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET throws <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> when accessing the GetInParameterValue property if in parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>存取 GetInParameterValue 屬性參數中沒有時。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage> the in parameters are available in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>參數位於<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> the in parameters are available in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>參數位於<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the parameter in the array of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 參數陣列中的參數以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the parameter at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>代表指定索引處的參數。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than 0 or greater than the length of the parameters array.
trans-unit.target: index 參數是小於 0 或大於參數陣列的長度。

trans-unit.source: Accessing this property when in parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: 存取這個屬性在參數中的無法使用。

trans-unit.source: For details see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Gets the out parameter passed into the XML Web service method at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得傳遞至指定索引處的 XML Web 服務方法，將 out 參數。

trans-unit.source: If out parameters are not available, ASP.NET throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> when accessing the GetOutParameterValue property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 out 參數無法使用，ASP.NET 會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>存取 GetOutParameterValue 屬性時。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage> the out parameters are available in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 在 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>在<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage><xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>可用 out 參數</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> the out parameters are available in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>中<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>的<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>可用 out 參數</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the parameter in the array of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 參數陣列中的參數以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the parameter at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>代表指定索引處的參數。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is greater than the length of the parameters array.
trans-unit.target: index 參數大於參數陣列的長度。

trans-unit.source: Accessing this property when out parameters are not available.
trans-unit.target: 存取 out 參數時，這個屬性就無法使用。

trans-unit.source: For details see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Gets the return value of an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML Web 服務方法的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: If a return value is not available, ASP.NET throws <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> when accessing the GetReturnValue property.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有傳回值，會擲回 ASP.NET<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>存取 GetReturnValue 屬性時。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage> the return value is available when the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> value is <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>傳回值時，才能使用的<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>值為<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapClientMessage>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> the return value is available when <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> value is <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>傳回值時，才能使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>值為<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the return value of the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>代表 XML Web service 方法的傳回值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The XML Web service method does not have a return value.
trans-unit.target: XML Web service 方法沒有傳回值。

trans-unit.source: OR The return value is not available.
trans-unit.target: 或傳回值無法使用。

trans-unit.source: For details see the Remarks section
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節

trans-unit.source: A collection of the SOAP headers applied to the current SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: 套用至目前的 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應 SOAP 標頭的集合。

trans-unit.source: SOAP headers are an optional portion of a SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 標頭是 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應的選擇性部分。

trans-unit.source: For more details on using SOAP headers in XML Web services created using ASP.NET and their clients, see the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用 ASP.NET 和其用戶端所建立的 XML Web service 中使用 SOAP 標頭的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>類別。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>

trans-unit.source: Although the Headers property can be accessed at any stage, it is only populated with the SOAP header information in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stages.
trans-unit.target: 雖然可以在任何階段存取的標頭屬性，它只會填入與中的 SOAP 標頭資訊<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>階段。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderCollection"></xref> of the SOAP headers applied to the current SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderCollection"> </xref>套用至目前的 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應 SOAP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if there are no SOAP headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有任何 SOAP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a representation of the method prototype for the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得適用 SOAP 要求 XML Web service 方法方法原型的表示法。

trans-unit.source: Although MethodInfo can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>, it only has data during <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然可以在任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>、 它只需要<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage></xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間的資料</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間存取 MethodInfo

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> representing the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"> </xref>代表 SOAP 要求適用的 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of either the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute"></xref> attribute applied to the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性中的其中一個<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute"></xref>或<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute"></xref>屬性套用至 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> for details about one-way XML Web service methods.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>或<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>單向 XML Web 服務方法的詳細資料。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The OneWay property is accessible in all stages of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: OneWay 屬性是在<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>的所有階段中存取

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute"></xref> applied to the XML Web service method is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute"></xref>或<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute"></xref>套用至 XML Web 服務方法<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來與 XML Web 服務通訊的 SOAP 通訊協定版本。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.SoapVersion%2A> property is guaranteed to be valid after the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>、<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.SoapVersion%2A>屬性一定會有效之後<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>階段。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.SoapVersion%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage> stage the property is available, however the SOAP message has not been completely processed and SOAP extensions that may alter the contents of the SOAP message have not run.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>屬性為可用，不過 SOAP 訊息處理不完全，而且可能會改變內容的 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能尚未執行的階段。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Stage property can be accessed at any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>存取階段屬性

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data representing the SOAP request or SOAP response in the form of a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 取得代表<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>形式的 SOAP 回應的 SOAP 要求的資料

trans-unit.source: SOAP extensions that inspect the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as a logging SOAP extension, can use the `Stream` property to view the data at each <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查代表 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應，例如 SOAP 延伸模組，記錄資料的 SOAP 擴充功能可以使用`Stream`屬性可在每個<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>檢視資料

trans-unit.source: SOAP extensions that modify the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as encryption or compression SOAP extensions, should do so with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> passed into the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension>.
trans-unit.target: 修改的資料代表 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應，例如加密或壓縮 SOAP 延伸模組的 SOAP 擴充功能應該這樣做與<xref:System.IO.Stream>傳入<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A>的<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension>。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension>方法</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A></xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The Stream property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage> passed into <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 資料流屬性<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage>傳入<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A>處於唯讀狀態。</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessage>

trans-unit.source: For more information on modifying the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, see <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何修改資料表示為 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ChainStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: A read-only instance of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀執行個體的<xref:System.IO.Stream>類別。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the base URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得 XML Web 服務的基底 URL。

trans-unit.source: The Url property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>期間存取的 Url 屬性

trans-unit.source: The base URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務的基底 URL。
